Producer: Amadeo Hernández Bueno, Pedro Hernández Santos, Alvaro Portanet Hernández
Production Co: Movistar+, Aquí y Allí Films, Instituto de la Cinematografía y de las Artes Audiovisuales (ICAA), Film Constellation, Televisión Española (TVE)
Synopsis: Stressed by her job at a diner, single mother Regina struggles to raise her two children in northern Florida. When her 14-year-old son has another brush with the law, Regina starts to worry that he'll wind up in prison like his father.
Title: Life and Nothing More
